product_name: Garmin Colorado/Oregon/eTrex Series GPS Handlebar Mount
long_description: This Garmin Colorado/Oregon/eTrex Series GPS handlebar mount lets you install your Garmin GPS securely on your bike's handlebar for convenient access. Quick-release allows easy GPS removal for hand-held operation or security when you're away from your bike. Installation of the bracket to your GPS will not effect its operational performance. Mount is compatible with the eTrex 10, 20 and 30; it is not compatible with older eTrex units. The Garmin Colorado/Oregon/eTrex Series GPS handlebar mount includes mounting hardware and instructions.
short_description: This Garmin Colorado/Oregon/eTrex Series GPS handlebar mount lets you install your Garmin GPS securely on your bike's handlebar for convenient access.
